  <hr> 
  <h2> Package uk.ac.cam.ucs.webauth </h2> The University of Cambridge Web Authentication System Java Toolkit. 
  <p> <b>See: </b> <br> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="#package_description"><b>Description</b></a> </p>
  <p> </p>
  <table border="1" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%"> 
   <tbody>
    <tr bgcolor="#CCCCFF" class="TableHeadingColor"> 
     <td colspan="2"><font size="+2"> <b>Class Summary</b></font></td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="WebauthDecoder.html">WebauthDecoder</a></b></td> 
     <td>Implements a decoder for encoded binary strings as used by the authentication system.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="WebauthRequest.html">WebauthRequest</a></b></td> 
     <td>Represents an authentication request message.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="WebauthResponse.html">WebauthResponse</a></b></td> 
     <td>Represents an authentication response message.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="WebauthValidator.html">WebauthValidator</a></b></td> 
     <td>Implements a validator for authentication response message.</td> 
    </tr> 
   </tbody>
  </table> &nbsp; 
  <p> </p>
  <table border="1" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%"> 
   <tbody>
    <tr bgcolor="#CCCCFF" class="TableHeadingColor"> 
     <td colspan="2"><font size="+2"> <b>Exception Summary</b></font></td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="WebauthException.html">WebauthException</a></b></td> 
     <td>Represents exception conditions within the WebAuth system</td> 
    </tr> 
   </tbody>
  </table> &nbsp; 
  <p> <a name="package_description">
    <!-- --></a></p>
  <h2> Package uk.ac.cam.ucs.webauth Description </h2> 
  <p> The University of Cambridge Web Authentication System Java Toolkit. This toolkit provides assorted classes implementing functionality associated with the University of Cambridge's Web Authentication System (UcamWebAuth). </p>
  <p> $Id: package.html,v 1.5 2005/03/30 13:21:40 jw35 Exp $ </p>
  <p> Current content of the package includes classes representing authentication requests and responses (<a href="../../../../../uk/ac/cam/ucs/webauth/WebauthRequest.html"><code>WebauthRequest</code></a> and <a href="../../../../../uk/ac/cam/ucs/webauth/WebauthResponse.html"><code>WebauthResponse</code></a> respectively), and a class for validating response messages (<a href="../../../../../uk/ac/cam/ucs/webauth/WebauthValidator.html"><code>WebauthValidator</code></a>). </p>
  <p> Copyright (c) University of Cambridge 2005 </p>
  <p> This toolkit is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. </p>
  <p> The toolkit is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Lesser General Public License for more details. </p>
  <p> You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with this toolkit; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA </p>
  <p> </p>
  <dl> 
   <dt>
    <b>Author: </b>
   </dt>
   <dd>
    Jon Warbrick, 
    <a href="mailto:jon.warbrick@ucs.cam.ac.uk">jon.warbrick@ucs.cam.ac.uk</a>, University of Cambridge Computing Service
   </dd> 
   <dt>
    <b>See Also: </b>
   </dt>
   <dd>
    <a href="http://raven.cam.ac.uk/project/waa2wls-protocol.txt">The Cambridge Web Authentication System: WAA-&gt;WLS communication protocol</a>, 
    <a href="http://raven.cam.ac.uk/project/">The Raven Project Website</a>
   </dd>
  </dl>
